titleStmt.title: An Encoded Transcription of Material from the Sylvia Beach Papers

change.ab: Transcribed cards s2: <*> March 7 = "Ricyman's"? s6: <*> 2 Dec = "Slat"? Bottom of card has beginning of "Philipson" card upside down
